website_summaries.verdict: It's middle-of-the-road for its price range – if you prefer a 43-inch model, the picture quality will impress you in spite of a few issues.
pros: A solid-built smart TV that owners say has crystal clear resolution – features UHD and 120Hz
Falls on the middle range of the price spectrum for its size and class
cons: Has only 2 HDMI inputs, and they are awkward to use
The remote and apps are confusing to set up, and tech support is subpar

customer_reviews.title: Here's the rest of it..,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful picture! Good TV, easy to set up. No problem with the TV, this ranking is for people like myself that need closed captioning. The closed captioning on this TV is right over the area where translations are given if regular caption is in foreign languages during an interview, where identify is stated for person being interviewed during regular newscast and also in same area where my cable identifies what upcoming shows will be about. This is something I find very frustrating to me, something that would prevent me from ever buying this particular TV again even though I love the rest of it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Terhune

customer_reviews.title: The picture on this television is great. Easy to use remote
customer_reviews.text: The picture on this television is great. Easy to use remote, will take some time to learn the remote. The "My Apps" loads fairly fast but getting certain channels to play all videos in a group requires you to hit play at the beginning of every video. My only wish for this device would be to have an hdmi out for those of us having a home theater so you can get the correct audio format instead of using the optical out that only supports 5.1 audio. Other than these two little issues the tv is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Barton

customer_reviews.title: Breaks down in 16 months
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. However, after only a year and four month, while we were watching movie, the screen start to flick slightly. Within 10 minutes, half of screen went blank and flicked and none of the remote key worked except the on-off button. The manufacture warranty only warrants the first year. I have never had a TV die on me before. This is the first smart TV I bought. It broke in 16 months. Great. We don't even watch TV at all, only stream movies from Amazon Prime sometimes once in a blue moon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but not great, it's for my folks and they like it although I have higher standards. Its a cheap 4K set so it CANNOT display 4K video at 60FPS, whether this is a software bug I'm not sure but either way this limitation makes using it as a PC monitor a terrible experience. The picture is pretty good but I did spend a lot of time in the menus disabling features like its 4K and 120Hz upscalers because otherwise it made every show look like it was shot with the kind of cheap camera equipment used on daytime soap operas.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Great TV. Average interface.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It was a great price. The TV looks great. Cons: Not a fan of the interface. Lack of native Plex app (other vendors support this). Wifi has some issues. I have to reconnect every time I turn on the TV. If you're a traditional cable TV user, this works fine. If you are heavy into smart TV functionality, you may want to explore some vendors that are further along.
customer_reviews.author: Lee V

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. After we played with the settings and got everything just right we quickly grew to love this tv! The colors are vivid but not overly so, and the image is crisp and clear...very lifelike, almost as if we are right there in the scene. Adjustments we made to the refresh rate add to the realism. We increased it just enough to remove motion blur without it being so fast that everyone looks like they're in a hurry. We're very happy with this tv. With it being hdcp-ready, it was a great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Super Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: My first "smart" TV. This TV looks and feels much bigger than its size. The color is so sharp and crisp - minimal pixelation. It was very easy to set up. When you turn in on there's a walk through setting up the picture quality, internet, etc. I love that there are so many apps already loaded onto the TV and plenty in the App Store. There was one time where I turned on the TV and the internet wasn't automatically loaded and there was a "no signal" screen but that was easily fixed by going back into the settings and reconnecting the wireless.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Crap wifi and poor contrast made me return.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a wearhouse deal and it said it was like new, the TV is a nice size and looks great, the 4k looks good and colors are vivid, unfortunately the contrast on the TV is dismal, and I watch a lot of dark film content like Penny Dreadful and Game of Thrones, this TV's black levels wanted out background details to the point of it looking like floating heads during a dark scene. Also had to return the TV because the wifi would not connect no matter how much i researched and tried to reconfigure my router.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Monticelli

customer_reviews.title: I've had zero issue with this smart Tv. For the cyber Monday price there's not ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had zero issue with this smart Tv. For the cyber Monday price there's not much more to ask for. I'll admit I've never had a 4K UHD Tv so of course I'm impressed. But regardless watching the Netflix Hulu and Amazon Prime movies on it is awesome.. With these newer, better quality movies coming out, you really see everything in these kinds of Tvs. I'm sure others are the same maybe better!!! But either way I got this one for the price and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: OhItsjeff

customer_reviews.title: Happy to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tv. Picture quality is good. Sound quality is good. Can be easily connected to internet. Only issue is it has less memory so when you watch any movie through browser movie stops it betweer and you get error clean the memory.
customer_reviews.author: Prafull

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture, Horrible Sound
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Connected easily with Internet and all the extras we have. Sound quality is AWFULL! But it seems that few TV's focus on sound anymore. I wish that there were side connections as well as back connection points. But it seems to be a solid TV which we hope to have for at least a decade. We've only had it for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mctundra

customer_reviews.title: Love the size and the picture is great
customer_reviews.text: This was my birthday present from my husband. Love the size and the picture is great. However, after only two months, the signal translater went out and the board had to be replaced. Luckily it was under warranty, but I was disappointed that it had to be repaired so soon after purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Blair

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year and a half. Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a year and a half! Last night, picture simply blacked out and TV blinks red lights with it not coming on. I will never buy an LG again.
customer_reviews.author: places2go

customer_reviews.title: DIED after 4 years!!! Worthless Assurant Warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Died after only four years. Worthless Assurant warranty that has cost me many hours wrangling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture and quality image... best out there in my opinion, however TV screen was extremely fragile. Just under a year of owning it with zero abuse, ended up bumping the screen with a small plastic bottle and destroyed the screen...
customer_reviews.author: CR of CRE

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in LG
customer_reviews.text: This TV lasted two years and died. It was gently handled and not used excessively. When I spend $500-plus on a TV I expect it to last more than two years. Extremely disappointed in LG.
customer_reviews.author: bbag

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture and good sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture and good sound. My major complaint is that the "smart" feature is anything but that... After more than a day or two this TV fails to remember my password on the internet and frequently logs out of hulu, netflix, etc requiring me to input my login and password info. It seems like I will have to purchase an additional AppleTV or ChromeCast device. If I would have known this I likely would not have purchased this TV model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it today set it up and best picture of any TV i have had. Great picture
customer_reviews.author: horseskipper

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a year and poof! The repair costs as ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year and poof! The repair costs as much as the TV itself. So just bought another Tv .. only not LG!
customer_reviews.author: Deepthi Sunder

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Original TV was cracked - got a replacement. Tv works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No pictures and only 14 month old and very little use
customer_reviews.text: After only 14 months and rarely used, our LG 49UF6400 tv has stopped working, no pictures. We bought this TV in November 2015 and has been in the bedroom but is rarely used. We only turn on the tv a couple of times per month and watch maybe an hour or two consecutively and is already broken. So disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hok

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best TV I ever had. The picture is perfect and it didn't cost an arm and leg. 3/2/2016 - Up date, TV still working perfectly and both my wife and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, Great Price. Very Good. I am going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: jake jung

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up around Christmas. I was skeptical because I always buy Samsung. I do have to say, I love this TV even more than my others.
customer_reviews.author: gregory duty

customer_reviews.title: After doing some research it looks like this is a common issue with all LG TVs
customer_reviews.text: The TV broke after 2 years and 1 month. The screen started blinking on one side. It was a manufacturer malfunction with no damage or misuse involved. After doing some research it looks like this is a common issue with all LG TVs. I'd suggest going with a different company if you're looking for a television of any kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Best TV at this size!
customer_reviews.text: The best TV at this size! Blacks are great and really set off the colors. Very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just under 2 years don't think there's a warranty screen menus still work but can't watch any content through any means which is weird just static noise
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Best screen I bought yet.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had ordered a bigger screen. The only thing I don't like is that this TV lacks support for smart phone control. I might be wrong, but if someone knows how to do it, don't hesitate to tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Turab Jafri

customer_reviews.title: Great until it breaks. 2 YR owner
customer_reviews.text: This TV is great until it breaks. I purchased it because of the low price and high reviews. It makes sense that early reviewers rate this TV highly. But, when you look at the 1 and 2 star rebiews, it's the same story every time. This TV is great until it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Picture is crystle clear good tv. The people complaining about it all are probably not using the right cord or cable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First one had a screen defect, Amazon replaced it promptly. Very pleased with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed that my new LG TV is not as Smart ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that my new LG TV is not as Smart as my older Samsung. It will not activate any HDMI locations without using the TV remote to change sources. My Samsung would automatically turn on the TV to any HDMI that was activated. Now I must have three remotes to control the Cable box, the Blu-ray player and the TV. When I called support to complain, she acted like it was a whole new idea.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: ... this tv for a few months now and I love it! Great picture and sound
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tv for a few months now and I love it! Great picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: and after I did that the picture quality was amazing. Netflix and Vudu are easily accessible in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for video games and movies. The settings in game mode needed to be adjusted, and after I did that the picture quality was amazing. Netflix and Vudu are easily accessible in the apps and can stream without needing another device, and the TV is very user friendly. I get a better connection to Netflix and Vudu through the TV then I do on my xbox one . Great picture, good price, I can recommend you buy this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from LG TV
customer_reviews.text: Worst TV. Only 1 year life. Pathetic customer support. The tv is now not repairable after warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This super high def TV is FABULOUS. Perfect screen size for a medium large bedroom. Makes everything look sharp, and almost 3D. The sound is so good that we no longer need external speakers. My only complaint is that set-up can be a bit confusing. It took over an hour to get it to connect to our cable box. This shouldn't be so difficult. Still, I will buy LG again.
customer_reviews.author: Trumpet Diva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I just wish it could be used with headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey O'dea

customer_reviews.title: Defectives TVs - yes, two of them
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this TV but the screen is messed up. We returned it the first time and got a replacement for free. This TV has the same defect. It's at the top of the screen it is warped inside the TV frame so creates a dark shadow on the picture. The shadow is most visible when a light colored picture is on. We have to return this one and will likely get a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No damage to the box but the screen has a weird rainbow shadow on the bottom left corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect bedroom tv
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom for her bedroom. Had bigger Samsung which was overkill. The LG is cute, perfect size for top of her dresser. This TV is NOT one to be mounted on a wall, the width is slightly fatter than my other TVs. There is only 2 HDMI ports and they are positioned so the cord sticks out. But she only has it hooked up to a cable box so it works great for her purposes. Picture is great. First LG and UHD TV I've bought. Bought an LG fridge which I love so I had to give this a shot, glad I did!!
customer_reviews.author: Fifi T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mind blowing!! The sound and picture quality is just astonishing. Just wow!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the depth is excellent. Overall a good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Picture is a little dark, but the depth is excellent. Overall a good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great LED. Some people complain about wifi connectivity, not an issue with me. 4k is great, netflix requires an upgrade and runs $11/month. Changed my sattv box to 4k at no extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scarlatos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tvs I've ever bought great price
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: ... online without being able to look at the picture like in the store
customer_reviews.text: i'm always scared about buying a tv online without being able to look at the picture like in the store. i am so lucky! the sound and picture is very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k TV for 600 bucks
customer_reviews.text: It is a Good TV. 4k Upscaling makes 1080P sources look even better than before. This tv struggles in dark scenes. If you favorite show is the following, this is probably not the TV for you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berkley

customer_reviews.title: First experience with LG products.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, I received shipment plus a replacement, both were defective and returned. I purchased a Sony locally and am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: 2HDMI PORTS? WHAT YEAR ARE WE IN?
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent tv but i was kinda shocked that it only has 2 hdmi ports on it. With all the gadgets that I have it's hard to get everything you want plugged in. You have to choose favorites and switch out the cords when u need to use another device. I might get a hdmi switch so i dont have this problem anymore. I can just switch the ports on the hdmi splitter without having to unplug anything.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: TV is great but LG needs to work on the packaging the ...
customer_reviews.text: TV is great but LG needs to work on the packaging the first two I received were damaged in shipping but it was taken care of with no problem
customer_reviews.author: G. Pflum

customer_reviews.title: goodgood
customer_reviews.text: I like this TV. I like its features and its picture. I might wish it had physical buttons to turn it on and off, and make other adjustments, as my previous LG TV did, but I'm getting by OK without them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Run!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for two weeks! Customer service is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love my new TV!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Living my 4k tv! However the built in screen share thing works only half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: So far had two TV's sent to me. Both with a warped display that clearly a defect. Send in my first one for a replacement which came back..with the same warped problem. This time it was in another location on the screen. I was very close to just brushing it off and keeping the TV until out of nowhere, i heard a pop sound and the screen cracked from where the warp image started. Seems they may be screwing the screws too tight or perhaps just half assing production. I sent another request for a replacement. This will be my final request. Will update if 2nd replacement comes with same manufacture defects.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: OK TV.  Awful Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The TV is OK but the LG Customer service is awful. I've called 5 times with the same results. They force you to go through their automated assistant and then after 3 minutes of going through the process they announce "We're currently experiencing higher than normal call volume. Please try your call again later" and then they disconnect you. I should have stayed loyal to the Samsung brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't like having a new TV that doesn't work and must ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV doesn't work. We have not been able to use it. We have been waiting for weeks for some parts to come in before it is repaired. I don't like having a new TV that doesn't work and must be repaired! I understand that there is always a chance that a tv won't work, however, I do not think that it is appropriate to sell a tv that doesn't work and not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Levan

customer_reviews.title: Just terrible
customer_reviews.text: Received my tv completely broke with a crack directly in the center
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first TV i ordered was great, the picture looked great
customer_reviews.text: The first TV i ordered was great, the picture looked great, its nice and light. However there was a weird ripple in the side of the screen. I returned it and got a replacement, the entire image is completely distorted like it was dropped on its screen. I'm hoping to replacement it one more time because other than the defects its great and it seems like everyone else had luck getting a good tv.
customer_reviews.author: ADV

customer_reviews.title: Cable tv would go in and out and some time ...
customer_reviews.text: Cable tv would go in and out and some time would not turn on at all. This has never happened on any other tv I have owned. DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Warner

customer_reviews.title: S***ty TV sold by Amazon. DO NOT BUY. ...
customer_reviews.text: S***ty TV sold by Amazon. DO NOT BUY. It will burn your retinas out as the human eye is not made to look directly at bright glossy light.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Defective Screen
customer_reviews.text: Returning tv because screen has some sort of light bleed through. Also seems very vulnerable to reflecting light in background. There is a strange rainbow effect. Very distracting. I have never noticed this effect in other Tvs I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: theodore gray

customer_reviews.title: THE TV IS EXCELLENT NICE PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: THE TV IS EXCELLENT NICE PICTURE! THE LEGS OF THE TV BAD DESIGNED WHO WERE DESIGNED WAS DRUNK NOT FOR JUST LG TV, ALL THE BRAND NAME TV HAS THE LEGS IS TOO WIDE FOR THE SMALLER TV CABINET. OLDEST BRAND NAME TV HAS THE LEGS ON THE MIDDLE CAN PUT DOWN ON THE SMALLER CABINET. HAVE TO HANG IT ON THE WALL. RECOMMEND THE TV TO MY FRIEND NOT FOR THE LEGS. THANK, AMEN
customer_reviews.author: ZOLTA ARMBRUSZT

product_meta.title: LG Electronics 43UF6400 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV (2015 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:43-InchLG web OS TV is designed to be obviously simple, so that it is easier to learn and more fun to use. Now, all you have to do is relax as 2.0 makes the TV experience simpler than before.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 38.4" x 23" x 3.2", TV with stand: 38.4" x 24.5" x 8.2"
Inputs: 2 HMDI, 1 USB 2.0, 1 RF, 1 Component, 1 Composite, 1 Optical Output, 1 LAN
